attributes.action: Stop European migrants  being able to Vote - for 5 years - in  any "British referendums" concerning European Treaties or Constitutional reforms or changes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe if we let new migrants from the EU vote in British referendums,  it will dilute our democracy and upset the true balance of British feeling.
All EU migrants should only be able to vote in their own referendum.
